titleStmt.title: The petition and articles or severall charge exhibited in Parliament against Edward Finch vicar of Christs Church in London, and brother to Sir Iohn Finch, late Lord Keeper, now a fugitive for fear of this present Parliament, 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sould by R. Harford at the signe of the Bible in Queens-head Alley in Paternoster-row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
